originalText.text: The band was awesome, they helped make  my grandmother’s surprise birthday complete. We were late arriving, but Jeff was understanding and accommodating with regards to price, as he was not able to stall the band past schedule. Will definitely book again in the future!

text.text: The band was awesome, they helped make  my grandmother’s surprise birthday complete. We were late arriving, but Jeff was understanding and accommodating with regards to price, as he was not able to stall the band past schedule. Will definitely book again in the future!

originalText.text:
The Street Beat Brass Band performed a Jazz Funeral for my late husband.  Jeff and the Band was very gracious and bared the cold weather of a rainy March day so courageously and professionally. They fulfilled a final wish and made my final tribute to my husband a beautiful celebration.  Those in attendance reported it was the most beautiful farewell and amazed how joyful it was.
My only regret was I wished I arranged their service for the whole day.

originalText.text: Street Beat Brass Band was AMAZING and I can't recommend them enough if you are in need of a second line band. Jeff was so great to work with and the entire band rocked. They even played as we walked our customers down the street to a happy hour venue in NYC!

text.text: Street Beat Brass Band was AMAZING and I can't recommend them enough if you are in need of a second line band. Jeff was so great to work with and the entire band rocked. They even played as we walked our customers down the street to a happy hour venue in NYC!

originalText.text:
Outstanding! My now wife and I hired the band to perform for our wedding cocktail hour, as well as our wedding party introductions that concluded with a second line parade across our venue. It was an amazing experience, and I still have wedding guests telling me it was the most fun they’ve had at a reception.

Jeff was great to work with throughout the planning, the band was professional, and the music was exactly what we wanted.

Thanks for everything guys!

originalText.text: We booked Street Beat Brass for our wedding, and Jeff was such a pleasure to work with throughout the whole process: timely communication, excellent samples of their music, answered all of my questions promptly over the course of two long, stressful years of planning. Unfortunately we ended up having to cancel our wedding due to COVID, and they were kind enough to refund our deposit right away. Above and beyond service and communication in the worst of circumstances. I am counting on booking them again in the future, when parties are back in full swing!
